title: Faithbreaker
content:
Faithbreaker Uncommon 2~11 Damage Versatile - Wielding With Both Hands 1d10 (1d8)+1 Bludgeoning Weapon Enchantment +1 Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks: A hand-like brand stamped into the leather handle obscures the notches that would normally signify a hobgoblin's rank.
